hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#Set the below parameters manually package_name="ansible" published_version="2.4.3.0"
#Check distro and available version in repo : rhel7.x, Sles11.x/12.x, Ub16.x/17.x . /etc/os-release if [ $ID == "rhel" ]; then available_version=$(sudo yum info $package_name | grep Version | head -1 | cut -d ':' -f 2| cut -d ' ' -f 2) elif [ $ID == "sles" ]; then available_version=$(sudo zypper info $package_name | grep Version | head -1 | cut -d ':' -f 2| cut -d ' ' -f 2) elif [ $ID == "ubuntu" ]; then available_version=$(sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-cache policy $package_name | grep Candidate | head -1 | cut -d ' ' -f 4) fi
if [[ $available_version == *"$published_version"* ]]; then echo "Version $published_version is already available in repo" echo "Exact name: $available_version ... Failing" exit 1 else echo "Published version is not available in repo. Going ahead." fi #-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
export Ansible_home=`pwd` #Install dependencies cat /etc/os-release sudo zypper update -y sudo zypper install -y git tar bzip2 unzip python-devel make which autoconf net-tools wget python-setuptools python-lxml python-ldap libxslt-devel gcc openssl libopenssl-devel libffi-devel python-xml patch ncurses ncurses-devel
#Install pip wget https://pypi.python.org/packages/11/b6/abcb525026a4be042b486df43905d6893fb04f05aac21c32c638e939e447/pip-9.0.1.tar.gz tar zxvf pip-9.0.1.tar.gz cd pip-9.0.1 sudo python setup.py install
#Get the source-code cd $Ansible_home sudo rm -rf ansible git clone git://github.com/ansible/ansible.git cd ansible git checkout v2.4.3.0-1
#Setup the environment and get Ansible modules: source ./hacking/env-setup git submodule update --init --recursive source ./hacking/env-setup -q
#Install Python Modules cd $Ansible_home wget https://pypi.python.org/packages/f7/83/377e3dd2e95f9020dbd0dfd3c47aaa7deebe3c68d3857a4e51917146ae8b/pyasn1-0.1.9.tar.gz#md5=f00a02a631d4016818659d1cc38d229a tar zxf pyasn1-0.1.9.tar.gz cd pyasn1-0.1.9/ sudo python setup.py install sudo pip install paramiko PyYAML jinja2 httplib2 passlib nose mock mercurial six patch django==1.11.7 call coverage coveralls funcsigs cryptography==2.0.3 boto3 botocore boto redis readline pytest-xdist pytest-mock python-memcached pycrypto s3 placebo netaddr pyVmomi f5-sdk
#Build cd $Ansible_home/ansible sudo make install
#Run the testcases make tests 2>&1 | tee testlogs && grep FAILED testlogs > generated_failures
cat generated_failures
echo ' test/units/cli/test_galaxy.py::TestGalaxyInitDefault::test_travis_yml FAILED [ 2%] test/units/cli/test_galaxy.py::TestGalaxyInitContainerEnabled::test_travis_yml FAILED [ 2%] ' > expected_failures
diff -u --ignore-all-space generated_failures expected_failures
#Check the ansible version ansible --version
